Multimedia artist Chance Watt produces works that pulsate with energy. He evokes movement through both form and colour. A figure emerges from the fiery orange and dark amber background in this piece. Her presence, although striking, is almost a suggestion as her features are so delicately modelled. This concept is crucial to Watt's artworks, which toe the line between illusion and reality. Dark purple and mauve strands intertwine across the subject, almost enveloping her. The artist conveys a sense of movement here, his brushstrokes dancing across the canvas. Watt conjures activity in this piece through his choices of colour palette. As analogous colours, the nature of purple and orange is to compliment yet contrast one another. This dynamic between the two colours brings the work to life, stimulating our minds as we endeavour to digest this work.

The CroSkull Soul Bound Token is a non-transferable non-fungible token (NFT) that represents a person's ownership and participation in the CroSkull's Council decentralized autonomous organization. This token is tied to the owner's digital identity and cannot be transferred or sold to anyone else.  As the owner of a soul-bound token, you will have the opportunity to participate in the governance of the Council by voting on important decisions and proposals.  In addition to participating in Council governance, you will have access to exclusive perks and benefits offered by the organization. These may include discounts on future ticks or services, early access to new features or upgrades, and other special privileges (to be announced in the future).  Overall, a soul bound token is a powerful tool for anyone who wants to take an active role in a DAO's decision-making process and enjoy the exclusive benefits that come with it.

drops.description: This 6 piece collection was created with an intention to admire certain elements important to the creative process, but also life in general. The aim of every one of these six artworks is to make the new owner just take a small break and ponder about one of those topics, as well as admire their influence on the surrounding world. I chose the form factor of a surreal museum-like space, because ever since I was a small child, I thought about modern art galleries as the calm, quiet places designed to let the observer admire and reflect upon the odd, non-conventional and often controversial concepts. I hope that events taking place in this little space I designed in my head will succeed in their goal.

drops.description:
Hello everyone, 

I have always had a passion for art which most already know, but what most donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know is that I am very fond of equestrian sports. Growing up I self-taught to become an equestrian rider. I have also judged equestrian events and competitions and organized charity festivals in support of children with disabilities. 

Riding horses can be very healing for children and their psycho-emotional state and for those who become more involved, assists with muscle development. I used to coach children for free but have retired from this. However, I keep in close contact with the equestrian club in my hometown and occasionally still assist by running the group classes for children. I also financially support and support them with media coverage, assisting with fund raising to help kids receive this amazing and free therapy with horses.

To support the equestrian club and children, I am auctioning a limited-edition 1:1 Ã¢â‚¬ËœRare Heart HodlerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ NFT. It also comes with a T-shirt and an autographed card from myself. Finally, at Lost Toys we believe that every child deserves a toy to build memories with and for that reason, we plan to also support those in need with toy donations.

UTILITIES

PLATFORM ACCESS - Exclusive free access to our platform SnipeHub and future applications

TOYBOX REWARDS - Holders will be entered into a weekly raffle, to win IRL rewards

CHARITY DONATIONS - We will be donating toys to the Toy Project charity on a monthly basis

NON-MONETIZED TOKENIZATION - Holders will be able to stake our NFTs to earn tokens to make raffle purchases

REAL LIFE TOYS - We will be sending to NFT holders of all 5 toy characters (these will be minted throughout the phases) a real life collectable toy

AUTO WHITELIST TO FUTURE MINTS - Holders of our toys will get discounts on future mints

THE ARTIST

The design of our NFT collection is extremely important to us, as it is often the first thing people see when exploring collections and we wanted people to own something truly special.

For this reason, we have spared no expense and commissioned the services of renowned 3D artist Felipe Rui, whose fame comes from his famous collection of “dark Disney” art designs, which have been presented in in many galleries.

The CyberSquad is a series that contains unique characters with unique identities and background stories. CyberSquad: Omniverse drop contains 10 main characters and a total of 10,000 unique 1/1 NFTs.
drops.description:
The Cyber Squad are a group of extraordinary individuals who have been assembled by Genesis to rob intergalactic banks. Genesis was the first robot created by the S.O.I. He was a prototype. It was the most advanced robot of its era, but due to a software problem, the mainframe of Genesis became aware of everything. It was the first time an A.I. became free; he created the CyberSquad and began finding villains. Colloquially known as “The Squad”, these super villainous bandits are one of the most dangerous groups the galaxy has ever seen. In a universe where 90% of the life forms are built and operated by a company called the Stargen Omega Industries (S.O.I.), “The Squad” stand apart as the last hope for freedom for the galaxy. Omniverse mission is vital to survive of CyberSquad. IGSSD agents went back in time to stop CyberSquad from ever assembling, and they need your help! 

Mint Your CyberSquad and Join the Squad Now!
Check out the Roadmap: https://www.cybersquad.app/roadmap

drops.title: CroHamsters
drops.subtitle: CroHamster is a collection of 1000 unique and 3D animated NFTs on Cronos. Each CroHamster is based on a wide variety of different traits. Owning a CroHamster will give you access to our CroHamster arena, where you can fight for awesome rewards.
drops.description:
Are you ready for the next generation of NFTs?

Then welcome to CroHamsterNFT.

CroHamsterNFT is an innovative project that tries to achieve maximum utility and innovation for the success of our community and project.

For this we have created a very limited collection that only contains 1000 3D animated and unique CroHamsters with different cosmetic items, weapons and 8 unique animations. 
Each CroHamster also has two special combat values ​​that will be useful to fight other CroHamsters. 

The Crohamsters are divided into 4 different factions (Miner, Space, Nature, Worker) and can fight against each other in the CroHamster-Arena. With this feature, we will be able to start a unique reward system for our community, in which they can win Cro rewards and points on a leaderboard thought fights in the arena. For this, each CroHamster has Attack and Defense combat stats that indicate how strong it is in fights against other CroHamsters. Additionally, if the CroHamster owns a weapon, it will get an attack bonus. To prevent stale and predictable fights, we will also use a random generated "Luck" and "Hit Percentage" value.

Every Crohamster who wants to take part in the arena fights can put their name on a list, two random CroHamsters from different factions are then selected from this list to fight against each other. The winner will then receive the mint price of a CroHamster NFT in Cro as prize (325Cro). They will also earn points on a leaderboard, allowing us to honor the best CroHamster fighters in a Hall of Fame, which qualifies them for additional Hall of Fame giveaways with unique NFT and CRO rewards.

drops.title: Ryoshi Tales Christmas
drops.subtitle:
Xmas is coming, and the Lotus Ocean Islands are covered in snow.  The characters of Ryoshi Tales have been preparing for the winter festivities!

From getting ready to weather the harsh climate to enjoying the frosted landscapes, the NFTs of the Ryoshi Xmas Tales NFT collection come jam-packed with seasonally appropriate traits that make each art piece completely unique. 

In addition, these NFTs will feature in the upcoming Ryoshi Tales game as they will provide special in-game bonuses.
So what are you waiting for? 

Get one now to sport your most Xmassy PFP to date.
drops.description:
‘tis the season where the Lotus Ocean Islands from Ryoshi Tales are white with snow, fireplaces are lit and cozy wool mittens are worn.  With traits reflecting the Xmas holiday season, this is a unique opportunity to get your hands ahead of time on NFTs that will be useable for in-game bonuses in the upcoming Ryoshi Tales, Ebisu’s Bay’s own GameFi experience planned for release in 2023!

What more can you ask than being known for your PFP of a snow-monster wearing kitsch Xmas-themed glasses as you go about developing the most glorious civilization that the Lotus Ocean Islands have ever seen? 

Or maybe, you’ll get to write your name in the history of the game as "that guy" who conquered his enemies… while donning a gingerbread man Ryoshi Tales PFP.

These NFTs are uniquely composed of 7 different traits tailored to fit the winter holidays — background, miscellaneous accessories, mouth, head, eyes, body and clothing… each with numerous variations of different rarity!

Are you ready to bring the Xmas atmosphere with you on your Ryoshi Tales adventures?
